alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 8:32AM MST until January 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. Visibility will be reduced below 1 mile at times. This includes portions of I-25 and U.S. 60.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
